description:
Dr. Bronner’s has been doing it right for decades. What’s "it" you ask? In this case, the answer is lavender bar soap that won’t dry your skin. Enjoy the soft, smooth lather on your body, face or hair.

  • Scented with pure lavender and lavandin oils to add calmness to shower time
  • Biodegradable
  • Vegan
  • Comes in a post-consumer recycled wrapper
  • Made with organic and Fair Trade Certified ingredients
name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Lavender Bar Soap 140g
